hackathon-description-text: This is Houston's annual civic hackathon.  It is a 24 hour civic hacking celebration!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Finance Director and Chief Business Officer, City of Houston
Chief of Staff for Mayor Parker
Assistant Director of IT, HITS, Enterprise Data Management, City of Houston
HITS Deputy Director over Enterprise Applications and ERP
Chief Procurement Officer, City of Houston

hackathon-eligibility: Everyone can participate.  Projects must be submitted by 12p on June 1 in order to be considered.
hackathon-rules:
We encourage open source contributions.
City of Houston employees will not be eligible for cash or product prizes.  However, they are allowed to participate in the hackathon.
By paticipating in this hackathon, you agree that the hackathon organizers, producers, sponsors, venue partners, and stakeholders shall not be liable for any disputes or damages related to the hackathon, its attendees, intellectual property, and related projects.
We encourage all teams to have an agreement in place before starting work.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: After the hackathon, three teams will be invited to City Hall for a private meeting with Mayor Parker and her senior staff.
Awarded at the discretion of the Boniuk Foundation.  They are looking for the best applications that encourage cross-cultural exchange.
Awarded at the discretion of the Boniuk Foundation to the best student team.
Awarded by the Rice Center for Civic Leadership to the project that has the most potential to improve the quality of life for people in the City of Houston.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=410 Pierce Street, Houston, TX 77002, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How much progress did the team make over 24 hours?
How relevant is the project to City of Houston services?  How closely aligned is it to one of the Mayor's priorities?
How difficult was the project?  How did they adapt to the hackathon format?
Did the team clearly present the material?  Did they make their project easy to understand?

hackathon-description-header: The official City of Houston Hackathon.
